shadow.name: CO-DEPENDENCE
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Approach, expressing through co-dependence

gift.name: SENSITIVITY
gift.description: The gift frequency of Approach, expressing through sensitivity

siddhi.name: SACRIFICE
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Approach, expressing through sacrifice

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 19 shadow frequency. The co-dependence you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural sensitivity. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from co-dependence to sensitivity.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your root. Notice the sensation of co-dependence.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 19 consciously for 7 days, the co-dependence pattern will shift toward sensitivity.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 19 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from co-dependence toward sensitivity
